data.title: Philip Wylie
data.meta_description: Philip Gordon Wylie (1902–1971) was a prolific American author on subjects ranging from pulp science fiction, mysteries, social diatribes and satire, to ecology and the threat of nuclear holocaust.
data.text:
Philip Gordon Wylie (1902–1971) was a prolific American author on subjects ranging from pulp science fiction, mysteries, social diatribes and satire, to ecology and the threat of nuclear holocaust.

The End of the Dream

1972 | science fiction

Los Angeles: A.D. 2017
